Cookie là các tệp hoặc mẩu dữ liệu nhỏ m: Cookies are files or small pieces of data that We store on Your computer, mobile phone or other internet enabled devices when You visit Our Website. The use of cookies is intended to make our Website easier to use and provide you with a personalized Web experience.
Những cookie thường chứa là kết quả của: These cookies typically contain the result of personal information entered by you on a website. Normally, when cookies store personal information, this information is encrypted in such a way that it cannot be read by any third party who stumbles upon Your cookies folder.
Cookie là một mẩu dữ liệu nhỏ được gửi t: A cookie is a small piece of data sent from our websites and stored by Your web browser on Your computer while You are browsing.
Khi được sử dụng, cookie sẽ được tải xuố: When used, cookies will be downloaded to Your computer. Cookie files are stored on or transferred to Your hard drive.
Trang web và Dịch vụ của chúng tôi có th: Our Website and Services may use cookies. Cookies allow us to personalize your experience on our websites, tell us what parts of our website people have visited, help us measure the effectiveness of our advertising and search the web, and provide us with detailed information about user behavior so We can improve our Website and Services. This data does not give out any personal details. This data collection is used for statistical analysis of our Website for our use.
Bạn có thể tắt hoặc xóa cookie bất cứ lú: You can disable or delete cookies at any time. Please note that because cookies are used throughout our Website, disabling or deleting cookies may prevent You from using certain parts of our Website and Services.
Nếu bạn đang sử dụng Google Chrome, để t: If you are using Google Chrome, to disable cookies:
'Cài đặt cookie' nên được chọn. Sau khi: 'Cookie settings' should be selected. Once done, select 'Block All Cookies'
Bây giờ tất cả các cookie sẽ bị chặn trê: Now all cookies will be blocked on your Google Chrome
Một cửa sổ mới sẽ mở ra có tên là 'Cooki: A new window will open called 'Cookies' Here you can view all the cookies in your Google Chrome Browser.
Nhấp vào 'Xóa tất cả' để xóa tất cả dấu: Click 'Clear All' to remove all traces of cookies
Nếu bạn chỉ muốn xóa một cookie nhất địn: If you only want to delete a certain cookie, simply highlight and click 'Delete'
Đối với các trình duyệt khác, vui lòng x: For other browsers, please see relevant browser support guidelines or resources.
Trang web của chúng tôi sử dụng cookie p: Our website uses session cookies and persistent cookies.
Đây là những tệp cookie tạm thời sẽ bị x: These are temporary cookie files that will be deleted when You close your browser.
Chúng nằm trong một trong các thư mục co: They stay in one of your browser's subfolders until you delete them or they expire.
Cookie xác thực được các máy chủ web sử: Authentication cookies are used by web servers to know if you are logged in and with which account you are logged in. This cookie allows us to provide you with a personalized web experience on our Website.
Chúng tôi sử dụng các cookie này để trải: We use these cookies for Your experience on our Website and performance. These cookies collect information about how our Website is used, for example which pages You visit most often and where error messages are sent. That data does not give out any personal details.
Những cookie này cung cấp cho Chúng tôi: These cookies provide us with reports that provide statistics that help Us determine how visitors use our Website, how they access our Website, and how We can help they find their way back.
Cookie bản địa hóa giúp Chúng tôi cung c: Localization cookies help Us provide You with a more localized and personalized experience. For that purpose, we may collect and store information that is on Your browser or computer so that You can view the Website in your preferred language.
Trang web của chúng tôi có thể sử dụng c: Our website may use cookies to deliver personalized advertising. Personalized ads provide a more relevant ad experience and help fund the development of new games.
Chúng tôi sử dụng một số dịch vụ của bên: We use a number of third-party services that may also place cookies on Your computer on Our behalf when you visit our Site to enable them to provide the services they are providing. Example: We are using third party cookies for statistical purposes. More information about these cookies is available on the respective third-party website.

Do các tiêu chuẩn giao tiếp trên mạng, k: Due to internet communication standards, when You visit the Website, We automatically receive the URL of the website You have been to and the website You will go to when You leave the Website.
